meanings.definition: To be astonished and speechless due to surprise or shock.
meanings.sent1: When I saw the magician make the rabbit disappear, I was completely dumfounded.
meanings.sent2: She was dumfounded by the unexpected news of her promotion.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked dumfounded when it saw a mouse riding a skateboard.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset dumfounded me, as if nature painted the sky with magic.
meanings.sent5: His incredible magic trick left the audience dumfounded and in awe.

meanings.definition: To be unable to speak or react due to being overwhelmed or amazed.
meanings.sent1: The little girl was dumfounded by the size of the birthday cake in front of her.
meanings.sent2: He was dumfounded by the breathtaking view from the mountaintop.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's adorable antics left everyone dumfounded with joy.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of the problem dumfounded him, like a maze with no exit.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected kindness of strangers dumfounded her, restoring her faith in humanity.
